intro.title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive guide on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics. This book covers the essential concepts, techniques, and practical implementations needed to understand and develop humanoid robots using Physical AI principles.
